comment.author: 22653270@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Vintage Drug Stores, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 29338224@N08
comment._content: I recently found a bottle in the ground in Surry NH. Just the bottom corner was visible. When I dug it up and pulled it out of the ground it was a 6" bottle in a light rose color and it says right in the glass "Bullard & Foster, Pharmacists, Keene, NH"! I had always heard of Bullard & Shedd but not Foster so after doing some research I am VERY excited to own a rare piece of my hometown history!
